author: abcoathup
content:
Generate entropy in a unique way for the KZG ceremony.  
https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/01/16/announcing-kzg-ceremony
You can write background about the KZG ceremony, trusted setups in general, EIP4844 & impact on Layer 2 and have some fun in the process creating entropy, perhaps writing a program to help gather it.

Examples:
Proof of cat: https://proofof.cat/
Marble run: https://twitter.com/Xofee3/status/1618406659659038720

Or you could perform analysis on the ceremony so far: https://twitter.com/skylenet/status/1616425825435545601
